author: coar
msg: Add another special-meaning envariable, force-no-vary, to allow
removal of the Vary field from response headers.

author: bjh
msg: Prevent grep error messages on systems with no /etc/passwd

author: bjh
msg: When spawning OS/2 CGIs, prevent handles to parent's side of stdio pipes from
being inherited by spawned child so pipes shut down when they should.

using "make" if the $MAKE variable is unset

msg: Fixed the ServerSignature directive to work as documented.
